availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Stephen P. Hogg (Hazard and Owsley Co storekeeper)

body.p: Hazard County and Owsley County, Kentucky storekeeper and postmaster. Whitesburg, Kentucky native. Married Sally A. Hogg.

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Perry County, Hazard, District 1, p. 68. Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registrations, 1863-1865, Kentucky, Eighth Congressional District, Owsley County, 1863, p. 155. Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Owsley County, Booneville, p. 2. Kentucky Vital Statistics Original Death Certificates (1911-1955), 1917, Breathitt County, file no. 26854.
